item.title: Emacs: Open links exactly where you want them
Drafting, Beyond Word
item.description: .org-center { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; text-align: center; } —————————————————————————————— There is no good way to write an essay. But there are several bad ways. Too common, I think, is the impulse to open up a fresh document in Microsoft Word — or Google Docs, or LibreOffice1 — and begin banging away at whatever process has worked in the past.
